K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-0: snying rje mi bshol ba zhes bya @47b pa'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-1: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-4: gnod pa thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-5: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-6: 'byung po thams cad nges par zlog pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-7: sems can mi khom pa brgyad du ltung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-8: de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bshad pa'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-9: thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-10: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdag la dgongs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-21: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:47b-25: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin du rjes su dgongs te thugs rje chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-4: snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi la bzhengs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-5: tsa la tsa la; tsi li tsi li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-10: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-12: dge 'dun gyi bden pas bzhengs su gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-14: byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad zlog tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-15: thugs rje chen po'i sprin gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-17: bi dhu na bi dhu na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-19: pra ma tha pra ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-23: bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-25: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-26: ma h'a padma hast'a ya sva h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-27: padma a'a sa n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-28: shve ta madzny'a au pa bi t'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-29: ki ri ta ne sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-34: tri na tre ya pra ham ru p'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-37: pra tsa pa ta ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-40: aanda dze bhyo bhya te bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48a-41: dza ra yu dze bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-0: sam sve da @48b tshe bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-1: aom pa pa tu ke bhyo bhyu te bhya: sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-2: bi ti ka bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-3: bee dha ti ki bhyo bhu te bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-4: shpha shna ke bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-5: sa na ni pa hi ki bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'a h'a; sarba buddho sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-7: bhu me aanta ri shi ts'a rye bhyo bhya dhyi bhya: sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-14: nad thams cad las srungs shig sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-17: pra ma tha pra ma tha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-21: na ma a'arya ba lo ki te shva ra a'adzny'a pa ya ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-012:48b-22: snying rje mi bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
